description: Korean fried rice gets a makeover with cauliflower without sacrificing any flavour.
name: Korean Fried Cauliflower Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the rice between 4 bowls, top each with a fried egg and chopped spring onion tops. Serve with sriracha and lime wedges, if desired.
